title: The Day I Disappeared - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Oneshot   Royalty
author: Shinonome Kai   東雲カイ
description:
Although it’s merely another political marriage in an aristocratic society, I was happy to be married with someone whom I loved sincerely.

..Even if he didn’t love me.>
